verses.verse: Then there was a famine<WH7458> in the days<WH3117> of David<WH1732> three<WH7969> years<WH8141>, year<WH8141> after<WH310> year<WH8141>; and David<WH1732> enquired<WH1245> of<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>.
